001package imagingbook.pub.edgepreservingfilters;
002
003import imagingbook.lib.image.access.OutOfBoundsStrategy;
004
005public abstract class KuwaharaF {
006
007        public static class Parameters {
008                /** Radius of the filter (should be even) */
009                public int radius = 2;
010                /** Threshold on sigma to avoid banding in flat regions */
011                public double tsigma = 5.0;
012                /** Out-of-bounds strategy */
013                public OutOfBoundsStrategy obs = OutOfBoundsStrategy.NEAREST_BORDER;
014        }
015
016}
